TopicTitle: Addons to make a more interesting Mun Base

Articles.Content: I was wondering if there are any addons that would make a mun base "neater"? I had thought about the kethane one and setting up a refueling station there.
Try NovaSilisko's BACE pack. It's a bit outdated since he stopped developing his mods, but it has nice base parts.
I would recommend the DEMV.
You might be interested in my panels mod, you'll find it in my sig. They're generic panels that can be used for walls.
